name: Block Crush Puzzle Solved
description:
Block Crush Puzzle Solved is simple but so funny and addicted!
Let’s explore the land of block with this free classic puzzle game! You will not be able to take your eyes off the screen when playing this puzzle blocks game.

HOW TO PLAY
• Drag the blocks to move them.
• Try to fit them all in the row or column. Then the block will be clear and you get the point. Game will be over if there are no room for any the shapes below the grid.
• Blocks can't be rotated.
• Don't worry! No time limits!
